Text: wow i totally forgot about this mini.
These are fresh Minutemen scans just released. I will upload issues #1/2 soon, as i couldn't find them here, but unfortunately they are older independent scans of lower quality.
How come you don't have that little skull next to your name like mirrormaster and the rest of the comic uploaders? I only recently discovered you, but you have a LOT of uploads. Thanks, btw.
